Hi,

I am using the "Harvard - Exeter*" Style. There is a little issue when citing multiple sources. The sources are concatenated correctly with a semicolon, however, after the semi colon there is no blank added:

(Roberts, Hann and Slaughter, 2006;Hippel and Krogh, 2006)

The issue can be solved when adding a blank to the separator parameter (node $params/citation/separator) in the HarvardExeter.XSL file.

Thanks for your work!

Hannes
Thanks for the feedback. I'll fix it.
